sources.title: Water Rustlers (1939)
sources.description: Shirley Martin finds that Weylan has diverted the water from the valley and her cattle are dying. First she and her foreman Bob Lawson go to court. This fails when Weylan's men keep the ranchers from testifying. But Shirley has a second plan to return water to the valley. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/water-rustlers-1939/

sources.title: Water Rustlers
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Water Rustlers (1939) DOROTHY PAGE
sources.description:
Stars: Dorothy Page, Dave O'Brien, Vince Barnett
 Director: Samuel Diege

 Shirley Martin finds that Weylan has diverted the water from the valley and her cattle are dying. First she and her foreman Bob Lawson go to court. This fails when Weylan's men keep the ranchers from testifying. But Shirley has a second plan to return water to the valley.

sources.title: Water Rustlers (1939) Action, Adventure, Western Full Length Movie
sources.description:
THE SINGING COW GIRL! SHE OUTRIDES…OUTSHOOTS…OUT SINGS THEM ALL! A true sweetheart of the West! 
Shirley Martin finds that Weylan has diverted the water from the valley and her cattle are dying. First she and her foreman Bob Lawson go to court. This fails when Weylan’s men keep the ranchers from testifying. But Shirley has a second plan to return water to the valley.

Director: Samuel Diege
Writers: Lawrence Meade, Don Laurie 
Stars: Dorothy Page, Dave O'Brien, Vince Barnett 
Genres: Action, Adventure, Western
